skills.name: Dishwasher
skills.description: Operating, loading, and unloading a dishwasher effectively

skills.name: Lawnmower
skills.description: Safely operating and maintaining a lawnmower

skills.name: Laundry
skills.description: Washing, drying, folding, and sorting clothes

skills.name: Driving
skills.description: Safely driving a vehicle, including for chore-related tasks

quests.title: 🛁 Chambers of Cleansing: Sanctify the Chamber of Waters
quests.description: Clean the bathtub or shower stalls, as well as the sink. Declutter and restock as needed.

quests.title: 🛁 Chambers of Cleansing: Purge the Porcelain Throne
quests.description: Scrub and disinfect the toilet, including under the rim and behind the seat.

quests.title: 🛁 Chambers of Cleansing: Polish the Scrying Glass
quests.description: Wipe down the mirror to a spotless shine. Remove all fingerprints and smudges.

quests.title: 🛁 Chambers of Cleansing: Cleanse the Tiled Moat
quests.description: Mop the bathroom floor, reaching behind and around fixtures.

quests.title: 🛁 Chambers of Cleansing: Cast Out the Unholy Offerings
quests.description: Take out the bathroom trash and replace the liner.

quests.title: 🍽️ The Hearthkeep: Cleanse the Feast Relics
quests.description: Do the dishes and put them away. May include dishwasher or handwashing.

quests.title: 🍽️ The Hearthkeep: Banish the Refuse of the Banquet
quests.description: Take out the kitchen trash and compost. Replace bags as needed.

quests.title: 🍽️ The Hearthkeep: Wipe the Alchemist’s Workbench
quests.description: Wipe down kitchen counters and stove top.

quests.title: 🍽️ The Hearthkeep: Scour the Hearthstones
quests.description: Sweep the kitchen floor thoroughly, including corners and under furniture.

quests.title: 🍽️ The Hearthkeep: Purge the Icebound Vault
quests.description: Remove expired items and wipe down fridge shelves.

quests.title: 🍽️ The Hearthkeep: Sort the Storeroom of Provisions
quests.description: Organize the pantry. Group like items and rotate stock.

quests.title: 🛏️ Chambers of Rest: Prepare the Resting Altar
quests.description: Make the bed neatly and arrange pillows and blankets.

quests.title: 🛏️ Chambers of Rest: Renew the Sacred Linens
quests.description: Remove and replace sheets with clean ones.

quests.title: 🛏️ Chambers of Rest: Dispel the Settled Ash of Time
quests.description: Dust furniture and surfaces in the bedroom.

quests.title: 🛏️ Chambers of Rest: Summon the Windwyrm to Cleanse the Rug
quests.description: Vacuum the bedroom carpet or rug thoroughly.

quests.title: 🛏️ Chambers of Rest: Restore Order to the Private Sanctum
quests.description: Tidy clutter and return items to their proper place.

quests.title: 🪜 The Passages: Cleanse the Steps of Passage
quests.description: Sweep the stairs, including corners and edges.

quests.title: 🪜 The Passages: Call the Carpet Warden
quests.description: Vacuum the hallway carpets thoroughly.

quests.title: 🪜 The Passages: Expel the Lurking Dust Imps
quests.description: Dust railings, corners, and baseboards in hallways.

quests.title: 🪜 The Passages: Marshal the Garments of the Journey
quests.description: Tidy up shoes and coats in the hallway.

quests.title: 🪟 The Great Hall: Polish the Thrones of Comfort
quests.description: Dust living room furniture, electronics, and shelves.

quests.title: 🪟 The Great Hall: Scour the Gathering Ground
quests.description: Vacuum or sweep the living room floor.

quests.title: 🪟 The Great Hall: Uncloud the Viewing Portals
quests.description: Clean living room windows inside.

quests.title: 🪟 The Great Hall: Restore the Harmony of the Hall
quests.description: Organize books, games, or clutter in the living room.

quests.title: 🪟 The Great Hall: Enchant the Resting Stones
quests.description: Fluff pillows and cushions. Straighten throws or blankets.

quests.title: 🌲 The Outer Realm: Trim the Verdant Expanse
quests.description: Mow the lawn and dispose of clippings.

quests.title: 🌲 The Outer Realm: Uproot the Thornkin Horde
quests.description: Weed the garden and flowerbeds.

quests.title: 🌲 The Outer Realm: Gather the Fallen Foliage of Autumn’s Wrath
quests.description: Rake leaves and place them in yard bags.

quests.title: 🌲 The Outer Realm: Exile the Refuse to the Dark Bin Beyond
quests.description: Take out all household trash bins to the curb or main container.

quests.title: 🌲 The Outer Realm: Cleanse the Threshold of the Homestead
quests.description: Sweep the porch or deck area clean of debris.

quests.title: 🧺 The Fabric Hall: Baptize the Woven Garments
quests.description: Do a full load of laundry and move to dryer or drying rack.

quests.title: 🧺 The Fabric Hall: Order the Vestments of the Realm
quests.description: Fold clean laundry and deliver to proper rooms.

quests.title: 🧺 The Fabric Hall: Separate the Linens of Light and Shadow
quests.description: Sort dirty laundry by color, fabric, and washing needs.
